episodes.description: A friendship is shattered.
Destruction and flames engulf the battlefield.
The War of Toushi is played out.
A minor leader is glorious in defeat.
How successful will Sousou be in capturing Kan'u?
Kan'u searches for the Crouching Dragon.
The cruelty of Toushi is exposed.
An assassin is sent to face the retreating Ryomou.
episodes.episode_name: Chance Meeting Of The Two Dragons

episodes.description: New gangs arrive on the scene as Ryomou flees to safety.
The awakening of the dragon is expedited by another's evil.

episodes.description: Daniela conoce a su papá y se entera de que no sabe nada a cerca de su reclutamiento en el centro juvenil.
Tatiana esta en el avión a punto de irse, pero Ezequiel se la lleva con engaños y la encierra en un cuarto de hotel para que Samsara cobre su venganza.
Kike le pide matrimonio a Jessica en el lugar donde se conocieron, mientras que Eleazar secuestra al Gato para vengarse de él.
Jessica le da a escoger a Kike entre su amor y la amistad de sus amigos. La prensa se entera donde está Juancho.
Pedro va a un operativo policiaco y se da cuenta que su compañero atacó a alguien que no se encontraba armado,  Pedro indignado decide darse de baja de la polícia.
Gaby va a casa de Octavio Valenzuela a hablar con la esposa de él. Octavio entra a casa de Gaby, destruye todo y descubre que Gaby es su hija.
Fercho y Tatiana tienen una fuerte discusión, Paloma se aprovecha de la situación para convencer a Fercho de que deje a Tatiana.
Tatiana cree que Leonardo aun está con vida y tiene mucho miedo.
Marce por error hace caer la cortina donde estaba el Caballo cantando, y la gente descubre que Juan David no es el que canta, por lo que Juan David no duda en reclamarle.
Daniela recoge los resultados de sus estudios de VIH. El Gato y Gabriela creen que el Alebrije les está robando.

clips.description: Jessica le organiza una fiesta sorpresa a Tatiana pero , sus amigos del 406 también por lo que Gaby cuando se entera y les avisa a sus amigos todo se sale de control.
clips.title: Clase 406 Capítulo 199

episodes.description: Los alegrijes descubren que el pequeño fantasma es Don Darvelio de niño y que está ahí para ayudarlos.
Allison les narra una historia a los alegrijes y los personajes del cuento se hacen realidad.
El alcachofa sigue sin poder recordar a Chofis porque el descabezado se robó su pensamiento amoroso.
Don Darvelio está descubriendo poco a poco las mentiras de Helga.
El papá de la Chofis está vivo, por fin podrán salir del horrible orfanato ella y su hermano.
Chofis se da cuenta que su papá está enamorado y le da mucho gusto saberlo porque ahora podrá formar una familia.
Chofis le pide a Alcachofa que nunca más la vuelva a dejar sola ya que está muy preocupada por los zombies. Ricardo está preocupado por su hermana.
Helga invoca a unos fantasmas piratas para llevar de vuelta a Don Darvelio al mundo de los muertos
Chofis está preocupada por la salud de su papá. Antonio le dicen que tiene leucemia.
Mercedes se da cuenta que Chofis es una excelente niña y le promete a su esposo que jamás se volverá a meter con ella.

Al derecho y al Derbez cumple 10 años en la televisión, junto a todos sus personajes. Alz y Heimer le dan tremendo regaño a su nieto. Julio Esteban lee una carta muy particular a su público. La cocina de Don Pepe Roni nos trae diferentes recetas para morirse de la risa.
El Agente D. Zente desenmascara al culpable del asesinato del millonario Mc Lucas y la pierna derecha de Lucerito es entrevistada por Elmer O. Lico.
Las 5 Herencias con Nelson Guerra y Simón Paz; Peliculeando entrevista al Indio Fernández; Medicazos de La Vida Real; Anuncio de la Ultra Suave;  Alz y Heimmer;  Errores con Furxhio.
Las 5Herencias presenta a la gente que sale en la tele no sabe ni hablar,  la película muda  y Eugenialidades presenta bola anti-estrés.
Las 5Herencias presenta a la gente que sale en la tele no sabe ni hablar,  la película muda  y Eugenialidades presenta bola anti-estrés.
Las 5Herencias presenta a la gente que sale en la tele no sabe ni hablar,  la película muda  y Eugenialidades presenta bola anti-estrés.

El niÃ±o va al doctor porque se come los mocos, Eloy GamenÃ³ viaja en aviÃ³n y cuestiona todo lo que va a pasar a la azafata, ToÃ±o cocina galletas con atÃºn, Reportajes de Derberaz con Valedor Narcia, La Hora Macabrona con la historia de Osama Bin Laden.
Primer episodio de XH DRBZ, donde se presentan los programas que serán parte de este ingenioso canal.
Sketches como Hans no entiende los dichos mexicanos, “Peliculiando,” y el Lonje Moco borracho en “La Hora Macabrona.”

description: XHDERBEZ es 'el canal' donde Eugenio presenta bromas como si sucedieran dentro de un canal de televisión y en donde los famosos se burlan de sí mismos.
name: XH Derbez

episodes.description: Mike is so impressed with Mandy's new boyfriend that he offers him a job; Kristin navigates her relationship with Ryan.
Outdoor Man's longtime architect, Bill McKenzie (Richard Karn), faces professional competition from a young, attractive woman; Vanessa wonders if her recent promotion was based on looks or talent.
Eve is suspended for name-calling; after Ryan gets a job, he buys a motorcycle.
After Mike brings home a duck he shot for dinner, he is forced to try to explain the circle of life to Boyd.
Mike secretly forms an afterschool dodgeball club for the neighborhood kids in hope of building character in Boyd.

networks.description: ABC is America's most watched television network. Their hit drama, news, and comedy shows include 'Desperate Housewives,' 'Lost' and '20/20.'
networks.name: ABC

description: A man is forced to take on more responsibility with his daughters when his wife returns to work.
name: Last Man Standing

clips.description: Mike explains how men became the most hunted species on Earth.
clips.title: Boys vs. Girls

clips.description: Mike feels we've all gotten a little too sensitive to words.
clips.title: Sticks and Stones

clips.description: Mike explains how eliminating competition threatens democracy.
clips.title: Teach a Man to Fish

clips.description: Mike laments property taxes and a lack of respect for dads.
clips.title: Mike and the Founding Fathers

episodes.description: As Tom and Julia work to save the show, Derek makes a decision that permanently changes Karen's and Ivy's lives; Ellis' true colors are revealed.
A crisis hits Rebecca Duvall (Uma Thurman) as Bombshell is set to face its first audience; Frank is forced to adjust to Michael's return; Dev tries to reconcile with Karen.
Ivy worries as Derek grows closer to Rebecca (Uma Thurman); Karen has to choose between Dev and the show; Ellen and Julia fight over Michael's possible return; Sam brings Tom to a family dinner.
The arrival of a movie star (Uma Thurman) turns Bombshell upside-down; Ivy and Karen try to overcome their history and unite against their new rival; Tom and Sam's romance heats up.

networks.description: NBC is home to hit shows '30 Rock' and 'The Office,' and includes a diverse mixture of classic and cutting edge programming.

description: A songwriting duo tries to create a hit with a Broadway musical based on the life of Marilyn Monroe.
name: Smash

clips.description: Go behind the scenes with Season 2's guest stars! The impressive list includes Jennifer Hudson, Sean Hayes, Liza Minnelli, Jesse L. Martin and many more!
clips.title: Guest Stars of Season 2

clips.description: New faces, new chances, new drama! Don't miss the season premiere of the all-new Smash, February 5!
clips.title: The All-New Smash

clips.description: Follow your passion, but watch your back! The all-new Smash returns Tuesday, February 5th at 9/8c.
clips.title: Smash Is Back

clips.description: Jennifer Hudson, Megan Hilty, Katharine McPhee and Christian Borle speak about what's in store for Season 2 of Smash!
clips.title: Smash's New Energy

clips.description: Derek and Tom have at it, uncovering some saucy history between the two.
clips.title: The Claws Come Out

clips.description: Ivy throws Dev under the bus, revealing the truth about their one-night stand.
clips.title: Busted!

clips.description: Things quickly fall apart when Frank learns the truth about Julia and Michael.

clips.description: In the heat of the moment, Dev spills the truth about RJ to Karen.

clips.title: Press Tour: Anjelica Huston

clips.description: Julia can't resist Michael's advances any longer.
clips.title: Julia Gives in

clips.description: When it comes to Broadway, no dream is too big.
clips.title: Beautiful

clips.description: Julia and Tom come to a harsh realization about their relationship.
clips.title: We're Not a Team

clips.description: Does Karen have what it takes? Don't miss the series premiere of Smash, Monday after the Super Bowl!
clips.title: Star Quality

clips.description: Derek is thrown off his game when he has a vision of Karen as Marilyn.
clips.title: Derek's Hallucination

clips.description: Sam surprises Tom when he wants to slow things down.

clips.description: Eileen's surprised to find that Lyle has a few tricks of his own.

clips.title: NBC's Smash Make a Musical

networks.description: truTV is the one network where the world of ACTUALITY comes alive, featuring real stories about real people in real high-stakes situations with original series that put the “real” back into real-life.
networks.name: truTV

description: Two brothers who own a pawn shop rarely see eye to eye except when it comes to finding deals.
name: Hardcore Pawn: Chicago

episodes.description: An uninvited houseguest torments twin boys; filthy neighbors move out, leaving rats behind; a dream house is plagued by an unholy stench.

networks.description: Dedicated to the unique relationships between humans and animals, this channel provides creatures features like 'Whale Wars' and 'Dogs 101.'
networks.name: Animal Planet

description: Unbelievable, real-life horror stories of ordinary people plagued by extraordinary infestations.
name: Infested!

clips.description: Check out some of the most disgusting and creepiest moments from Animal Planet's "Infested!"
clips.title: Infested! - Creepiest Mashup Ever!

clips.description: A suburban family finds out they have an infestation of squirrels in their attic, gnawing on electrical wires, which could end up burning the family's entire house down!
clips.title: Infested! - Squirrels May Burn Down House

clips.description: An Arizona couple and their children start fresh with a new home but soon find that they aren't the only tenants! An infestation of roaches is destroying their eletronics and ruining their home.
clips.title: Infested! - Roaches Wreck Family's Dream

clips.description: A family is forced to abandon their home when it is discovered to be infested with ticks. Even after exterminators try to clear the place, the family still finds thousands of ticks in their living room!
clips.title: Infested! - Room Full of Ticks

clips.description: A college student's home is inhabited by a opossums, pushing her to the brink of sanity. One day she collapses in the bathroom and has to be rushed to the hospital!
clips.title: Infested! - Opossums Infest Student's Home

clips.description: Even after a house is cleared of bird mites, one of the owners can't stop himself from frantically searching every inch of the house over and over again.
clips.title: Infested! - Man Obsesses Over Bird Mites

clips.description: A family is evicted from their house after a baby arrives when a colony of recluse spiders moves in. The spiders are a deadly threat to the child. Can they be exterminated?
clips.title: Infested! - Recluse Spider Breeding Ground

clips.description: A family believes their nightmare bed bug infestation is finally over, but sniffer dogs tell a different tale. Bed bugs are still everywhere, despite how hard the family has tried to get rid of them!
clips.title: Infested! - Sniffer Dogs Find Bed Bug Infestation

clips.description: An extreme bat infestation takes a horrifying turn when one of the bats attacks a family's four-year-old son. Jordan is treated for a possible rabies infection, a heartbreaking ordeal for his parents.
clips.title: Infested! - Bat Attacks Four-Year-Old

clips.description: A condemned house in Pennsylvania is infested with cockroaches, and when the madness spills over to the house next door, the owners declare they've had enough!
clips.title: Infested! - Home Overrun With Roaches

clips.description: A couple discovers a strange smell in their home. The shocking root of the problem: gallons upon gallons of cave cricket poop festering in their basement!
clips.title: Infested! - Home Filled With Cricket Poop

clips.description: Rats are among the most resillient mammal species on the planet. They are capable of reproducing 2,000 times in a single year and up to 14,000 times in their lifespan!
clips.title: Infested! - Giant Rat Invasion!

clips.description: Bedbugs are like vampires that live in your bedroom. They come out at night to suck your blood, then go back to where they were hiding.
clips.title: Infested! - Extreme Bedbug Infestation

episodes.description: Spartacus and his formidable army continue to outwit Rome's best commanders; the powers of the Empire desperately turn to wealthy politician Marcus Crassus for help in crushing the rebellion.
